sentences.en: All adult males will be liable for conscription.
sentences.cn: 所有成年男子都有义务应征入伍。

sentences.en: Deliver conscription notices throughout all the provinces.
sentences.cn: 向全国各省发布征召通知.

sentences.en: Do you know how Russian peasants feel about conscription?
sentences.cn: 你们都知道俄国农民是怎样看待征兵的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Generally speaking, conscription system played a main role during the early Western Han.
sentences.cn: 大体而言:西汉初期以征兵为主.

sentences.en: He was 16 when war broke out and reached 18 as conscription was being introduced.
sentences.cn: 在他16岁那年战争爆发了,征兵时他恰满18岁.

sentences.en: In the U . K. a kind of conscription was long in force.
sentences.cn: 在联合王国, 一种征兵制长期有效.

sentences.en: On history, the cattle mildest and the most fragrant conscription propagate a slogan most!
sentences.cn: 史上最牛,最温馨的征兵宣传标语!

sentences.en: Other sources of extra-budgetary income include funds from the central government and local governments for defense mobilization preparations, conscription, and demobilization.
sentences.cn: 其他预算外进项来源包括来自中央和地方用于防卫动员的准备工作、征兵以及复员安排的资金。

sentences.en: Still others fled over to avoid conscription.
sentences.cn: 还有一些人为逃避征兵拉夫而逃到山里.

sentences.en: The CDU leadership has agreed to end conscription.
sentences.cn: 基民盟领导层同意结束征兵.

sentences.en: The man fled to the mountains to avoid the conscription.
sentences.cn: 为了逃避徵兵,那个人躲到山里去了.

sentences.en: The military service system provides the conscription activities with regulations to follow.
sentences.cn: 兵役制使我国的征兵行为有章可循了.

sentences.en: The reintroduction of conscription sparked off a major rebellion.
sentences.cn: 再次征兵引发了一次大规模的暴乱.

sentences.en: The youth banded together to resist conscription.
sentences.cn: 年轻人们联合起来拒绝从军.

sentences.en: They said the present system of military conscription should be phased out.
sentences.cn: 他们说，当前的征兵体系应当逐步废除。

sentences.en: They were rather earnest about the Tommies, and the threat of conscription, and the shortage of sugar and toffee for the children.
sentences.cn: 他们对于军队，对于征兵的恐吓，对于儿童们的糖与糖果的缺乏，是颇郑重其事的。

sentences.en: Your body full compliance with the requirements of conscription.
sentences.cn: 你的身体完全符合征兵要求。

trans.tran_en: when people are made to join the army, navy etc
